backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with data types, maps, authorization mixin, rate limiting, and user profile management endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing an admin access-denied UX improvement and listing related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables, light/dark mode tokens, and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point bootstrapping the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and linking to the sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing main site routes with change frequency and priority hints.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and includes a global Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: UI component showing an access-denied message with retry, sign-out, and home navigation actions.
Auth gate that handles II login, admin permission checks, retry logic, profile setup, and gated rendering.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Login panel prompting Internet Identity authentication with loading states and admin-only notice.
frontend/src/components/admin/backup/Bac: Panel for exporting site data to JSON and importing backups with preview and validation.
frontend/src/components/admin/pages/Page: Admin interface to list, create, edit, and delete custom pages with metadata.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSet: Modal form for setting admin profile, using a mutation to save name and email with error handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/promotions: Admin panel to manage promotional banners, including add, edit, reorder, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/A: Settings UI to configure WhatsApp, call, and order action buttons and save updates.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/S: Panel for editing location/contact info and managing opening hours with add/remove operations.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Provides a Section wrapper with optional patterned background and a SectionHeader component for titles and subtitles.
frontend/src/components/FindUs/GoogleMap: Embeds a responsive Google Maps iframe using the centralized config URL.
frontend/src/components/forms/CateringEv: Implements a catering event request form with field validation and submission using a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Implements a basic contact form with validation and async submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/forms/Reservatio: Handles restaurant reservation submissions with validation, guest count, and optional special requests.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Displays a responsive image grid that opens a selected item in a lightbox.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryL: Renders a modal lightbox for gallery images with navigation controls and keyboard support.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCat: Shows a grid of predefined menu categories with icons, descriptions, and a link to the menu page.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Builds the site footer with branding, quick links, contact info, hours, and dynamic custom pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with logo, dynamic navigation links, and mobile menu using custom pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main page layout including header, promotions strip, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuFilters: Category filter tabs for menu items with support for selecting and changing categories.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuList.ts: Displays menu items in a responsive card grid with prices, descriptions, and tags.
frontend/src/components/promotions/Promo: Shows active promotions in dismissible alerts sorted by order.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Static site configuration containing contact info, hours, social links, and metadata.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Static gallery item definitions with images, captions, and categories.
frontend/src/data/menu.ts: Defines menu categories and a full list of menu items with descriptions, prices, and tags.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPages.ts: Mutations for creating, updating, and deleting custom pages with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPromotions.ts: Admin queries and mutations for managing promotions including add, update, delete, and fetch.
Admin mutations for location, opening hours, and button configuration with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Provides hooks to query admin status and fetch the callerâ€™s user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Defines mutations for exporting and importing backend data, invalidating queries after import.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomPages.ts: Fetches all custom pages or a single page by slug through actor-based queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryData.ts: Returns static gallery data via a query, prepared for future backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for managing login, identity state, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenuData.ts: Provides static menu and category data through a query, ready for backend integration later.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Fetches static SEO config for a given page key using a query.
frontend/src/hooks/usePromotions.ts: Queries the backend for active promotions using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines mutations for submitting contact forms, reservations, and catering events, with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteSettings.ts: Fetches location, opening hours, and button configs from the actor with fallbacks for location data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and theme variables defining light/dark palettes and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO setup, branding sections, and descriptive content about the restaurant.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard with authentication gate, tabs for site management, and logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders the contact page with a form, location details, opening hours, and SEO plus JSON-LD data.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPage.tsx: Loads and displays custom CMS pages by slug with SEO handling and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery page with SEO and a grid of images fetched from gallery data.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with hero content, featured categories, and promotional sections using SEO config.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Displays menu items with category filters and applies menu-specific SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/OrderReservePage.tsx: Provides reservation and catering request forms via tabbed UI with associated SEO settings.
frontend/src/seo/LocalBusinessJsonLd.tsx: Generates and injects JSON-LD structured data for the restaurant using site settings.
frontend/src/seo/seoConfig.ts: Defines default and per-page SEO configurations using site metadata.
frontend/src/seo/useSeo.ts: React hook that sets document title, meta tags, canonical URL, and social preview tags.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for retrieving, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, with support for hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color system, typography, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, features, and known issues for the restaurant website build.
